content.title: Map Dashboard
content.subtitle: The interactive interface for running analytics, applying AI models, and visualizing results within your AOI.
description: The Map Dashboard is the central workspace in SEAk where you interact with your data, run analyses, and generate insights.
In the Projects section, navigate to the desired Project.
You will now see the interactive Map Dashboard zoomed into the set AOI.

rows: Run AI Model
Run AI models on selected datasets for predictive analysis, generating vector layer outputs.
Assessments
Run indices using raster dataset bands within the AOI to create classified raster layers.
Compare Map
Compare two layers visually, switch base maps, and check differences.
Annotate
Create annotation layers, set classes, and draw them on the map. Includes AI-assisted labeling and editing tools for QC.
Proximity Analysis
Assess proximity of objects to points/lines/polygons, run spatial/attribute queries, and generate statistics.
Change Detection
Compare pre- and post-disaster imagery and view results with infographics.
SEAk Aware Analysis
Run environmental integrated cleanup planning based on user-defined configurations and model predictions.
Map View
Displays the AOI from the workspace.
Pull Vector
Add vector data directly from the database.
Comments
View and reply to all geotagged comments on the map.
SEAk Aware Configuration
Configure layers, add details, and define Do’s/Don’ts for SEAk Aware Analysis.
Download Report
Download a snapshot of the dashboard as a PDF.
More Options
Contains tools such as Comments, SEAk Aware Configuration, and Report Download.
Notification
Displays updates on predictions or data processing completion.
Profile Icon
View user profile and change dashboard color mode.
Base Map
Switch base map types from available options.
Layer View
Manage available and processed layers with display options.
Full Screen
Expand the Map Dashboard to full screen view.
Measurement
Measure distances or areas between features.
Zoom In/Out
Zoom controls for navigating the map.
